feed.title: Open Block Chain Licence, BIP[xxxx] Draft

entry.title: Open Block Chain Licence, BIP[xxxx] Draft
entry.summary: Ahmed Zsales sent a message to the bitcoin-dev mailing list on September 1, 2015 suggesting that the Bitcoin network needed a block chain license. This topic was previously discussed in 2012 on bitcointalk.org. Bryan, who signed off on the email, provided his website and phone number for further contact.
